Home Finance Made Fun

Mortgage Events in the Portland, OR Area

The housing market in and around Portland is competitive, so it can feel daunting for buyers to begin the hunt for their next home. Plus, when pet owners tack the needs of their beloved furry friends on top of their own, they end up with a long list of must-haves for their dream property, making the search seem even more complicated.

What if there was a way to help ease up this process?

Join me for a fun, twenty-minute presentation that will leave you with a comprehensive understanding of mortgage products and how you (and your pets!) can benefit from them.

Next event: Thursday, March 12th at The Verdict Bar & Grill in Oregon City (110 8th St, Oregon City, OR 97045)

Check back for future events!
